sentence.Network_en: I realized I had to surmount the language barrier.
sentence.Network_cn: 我意识到我不得不克服语言障碍。

sentence.Network_en: We laid about to surmount the obstacle.
They surmount one crag after another.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们登上一块又一块的峭壁.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... mountainous a 多山的；巨大的 surmount v 克服（困难等） insurmountable a 难克服的.
3S企业管理文化精髓即：谋略（Strategy）速度（Speed）超越（Surmounting）中文释意：做具备谋略特质的企业，在速度中超越自 …
度字(多音)可以组什么词_百度知道 ... [excel] 超越;胜过 [surmount] 同“渡越”;越过 [compare length and size] 比较长短大小.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... surmise 推测 surmount 战胜 surname 姓.

list.abs: It can surmount obstacles , eulogize differences , stimulate inspirations and bring about instructive effects and wealth ., 它可以跨越障碍 , 颂扬差异 , 激发灵感 , 带来教益 , 创造财富.
surging 涌surmounted arch 超半圆拱surmounted vault 超半圆拱
they are brave in to innovate , in surmount oneself while also changing Kunming real estate pattern ;他们勇于创新，在超越自己的同时也在改变着昆明地产格局；
they surmount one crag after another .他们登上一块又一块的峭壁。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also in the sense 'surpass, be superior to'): from Old French surmonter (see sur-, mount)

entry.def: If you surmount a problem or difficulty, you deal successfully with it.

example.ex: I realized I had to surmount the language barrier.
example.tran: 我意识到我不得不克服语言障碍。

entry.def: If something is surmounted by a particular thing, that thing is on top of it.

example.ex: The island is surmounted by a huge black castle.
example.tran: 岛的最高处耸立着一座巨大的黑色城堡。

means.word_mean: 1. get on top of; deal with successfully;
4. be or do something to a greater degree;

sentences.sentence: "her performance surpasses that of any other student I know"
"This car outperforms all others in its class"

auth_sentence.content: But other major cities have managed to surmount such problems.
auth_sentence.res_content: But other major cities have managed to surmount such problems.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But other major cities have managed to surmount such problems.

auth_sentence.content: Rachel is unable...to surmount her speech impediment.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rachel is unable...to surmount her speech impediment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rachel is unable...to surmount her speech impediment.

auth_sentence.content: These are obstacles inherent in the source of the energy that will be difficult to surmount.
auth_sentence.res_content: These are obstacles inherent in the source of the energy that will be difficult to surmount.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These are obstacles inherent in the source of the energy that will be difficult to surmount.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 等在同辅音词根前表示"在下面;随后"; 2. 表示"超过,在……上面"

stems_affixes.word_buile: sur在下面;随后+rept爬+itious……的→在下面爬→鬼鬼崇崇的
sur超过,在……上面+plus多余;加→多出很多
sur在下面;随后+render给予→把[枪]放下去→投降
surround[v.包围]+ing表名词→被围起来的状态→环境
sur超过,在……上面+charge费用→额外的收费→附加费
sur超过,在……上面+face脸面→n.表面
sur超过,在……上面+realism现实主义→n.超现实主义
sur超过,在……上面+tax税→n.附加税
sur超过,在……上面+veil面纱+lance→在面纱上看[隔了一层纱]看→临视
sur超过,在……上面+viv生命+al表名词→经过事故活着→幸存
sur在下面;随后+render给予→把[枪]放下去→投降
sur在下面;随后+round圆圈→在下面围一圈
sur超过,在……上面+mount山→在山上→登上
sur超过,在……上面+pass通过→在上面通过→超越

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不能克服的,难以对付的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+surmount克服+able可以……的→不能克服的
mountain[n.山]+ous……的→adj.多山的;山一般的
para类似+mount登上,山,安装→类似高山→最高的
tant相等+amount数量→相等的数量
a=ad+mount上→总计
mount登上→山
mount登上,山,安装+ain表名词→n.山
mounte=mount登上+bank=bench→登上长椅[卖假药]→江湖骗子
a=ad+mount上→总计
dis去,下+mount登上,山,安装→从[马上]下来
mount登上→山
re重新+mount登上,山,安装→再次登上
sur在……上面+mount山→在山上→登上

sentences.en: I think most of these obstacles can be surmounted.
sentences.cn: 我认为这些障碍大多数都是可以克服的。

sentences.en: The house was surmounted by a tall chimney.
sentences.cn: 屋顶上有一个高高的烟囱。
